Header: Former president Rajapaksa makes statement on road development projects (Watch video)
Content: Former President Mahinda Rajapaksa says that parties thatÂ questioned him on money allocated for road development projects are the very same individuals he helped in the recent past. He made this statement at an event held in Ambalantota on Monday, June 1.
